sent.orig: PRODUCT: Porcelain Polished Tile, Porcelain Glazed Tile, Glass Mosaics, Stone Mosaics, Resin Bathroom Products.
sent.trans: 产品(PRODUCT)：瓷质抛光砖，瓷质釉面砖，玻璃马赛克，石材马赛克，树脂浴室产品。

sent.orig: PRODUCT:We are specilized in manufacturing all kinds of ceramic and sanitary ware products:basins, toilets etc.
sent.trans: 产品(PRODUCT):本厂是一家专业生产各类陶瓷卫浴产品，主要的产品有：座便器、蹲便器、台盘、艺术盘、妇洗器、柜盘、小便斗等。

sent.orig: These cases involve a medicine product, product, instrument, machine product, mineral, light industry product etc. s.
sent.trans: 这些案件涉及医药产品、纺织品、仪器、机械产品、五矿、轻工业产品等。

sent.orig: Modern market marketing study product strategy including three aspects: Core product, form product, additional product.
sent.trans: 现代市场营销学的产品策略包括三个方面：核心产品、形式产品、附加产品。

sent.orig: Product development-Invest in product development in existing and new product areas and technologies.
sent.trans: 产品开发――在现有的和新的产品领域及技术领域投资进行产品开发。
